alert.note: Alert for Windham (Connecticut) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 13 at 3:34PM EDT by NWS Boston
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Windham, west central Kent and southwestern Providence Counties through 430 PM EDT... At 334 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Brooklyn, or near Plainfield, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Strong winds could cause minor damage such as downed branches. Locations impacted include... Coventry, Plainfield, Killingly, Burrillville, Scituate, Glocester, Putnam, Brooklyn, Canterbury, Foster, Pomfret, Sterling, Chaplin, Hampton, Eastford, and Scotland. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Get indoors when you hear thunder. Do not resume outdoor activities until at least 30 minutes after the storm has passed. This storm may intensify and become severe. Stay tuned to your local media for updates and possible warnings.
